reviewText:
I liked all three of these movies. Kevin Sorba is one of my best liked actors. I shared this with several friends and they
all liked it .  I thin this was a very good buy. If a person likes westerns these are very good choices.

I purchased this western triple feature awhile ago and I can honestly say I've watched it at least twenty times.  Prairie Fever was hilarious with Kevin Sorbo having to deal with those four crazy women. He is such a great actor, he makes every role he plays so believable.
I love these movies. They star two of my favorite actors. Great westerns. Anyone who likes westerns, I highly recommend getting these.

3 Western movies in the same package.
The Pledge:  Costumes: 5/5  Acting: 4/5  Filming and scenery: 5/5  Story: 3/5
Avenging Angel:  Costumes: 4/5  Acting: 3/5  Filming and scenery: 3/5  Story: 3/5
Prairie Fever: Costumes: 4/5  Acting: 4/5  Filming and scenery: 4/5  Story: 4/5
For the price, Definitely a 3/5  highly recommended for the western movie lovers

I had seen these movies on television,and was happy to order them on Amazon. I do need to read a bit more carefully before purchase though. I assumed because I watched them "with caption"on tv,they had caption on the purchased dvd. No caption,on any of them. I am hard of hearing and caption helps greatly.  From now on, I shall check to make sure "Caption included. "  I forgot my rule of thumb,"Never assume."
I am a big fan of Kevin Sorbo and was also a big fan of Hercules, he is an awesome actor and does a superb job.  I also like Luke Perry in this movie as well.

You cannot go wrong with this triple feature.  Each individual film is good.  The Pledge, also known as The Gunfighter's Pledge, being the best of the 3, but closely followed by the other 2, Avenging Angel and Prairie Fever starring Kevin Sorbo.

All 3 have common western themes but each are very entertaining re-tellings in themselves.  I have written individual reviews of each if you'd like to look at those.  Suffice it to say, IMO, this triple feature is the way to go instead of purchasing these individually unless you collect the artwork too.

One thing you will notice is the same sets are used for the Luke Perry film The Pledge, and the Kevin Sorbo film Avenging Angel.  This is most evident in the ranch house scenes.  It didn't bother me but some might find it a little aggravating if watched back to back.  Just mentioning this so you'll know up front.  In fact the 2 films are similar in many ways, with some different twist, but familiar.  I think, though, you'll be very happy with this set.  I'd rate this a solid 4.5 overall.  Enjoy and have a good day!

I had seen these three movies during one of the Preview times for Hallmark Channel on Dishnetwork.  Many times before buying movies, I'll see them either at a theater or on a movie channel.  If it's a "keeper", meaning "I'd like to see it many times over". . . it's not a "Once is enough" thing. . . then I buy it. If I don't like it I don't buy it.  Kevin Sorbo and Luke Perry do a great job in these Westerns.  Now I don't have to wait for Hallmark to come along to see them. Thank you for paying attention to my likes and dislikes.

Billie

All three of these Westerns were good, and enjoyed the actor and actresses in the movies. I had never seen these guys act before and were just as good as Clint Eastwood.  I would buy more movies of these kind with these actors and actresses. Fast shipping also.

I enjoyed these movies tremendously; good, family fun. I particularly liked the Sorbos since they help to keep my collection up to date.
Package arrived in good condition, quickly. Would happily use this vendor again.
Great

good movie.

I love it.

I like Kevin Sorbo.  I watched all of these and enjoyed them.  Luke Perry was surprisingly good in a Western.  They should cast Luke Perry in more Westerns.  Good value.  Enjoy.  Will watch again when I forget the endings.....

Great Item - Love It - Would recommend highly.
All these movies are very good and have great actors, stories and background.  I would be happy to share these thoughts with others.
I had not seen either of the three films and I enjoyed them all. My favorites were the Kevin Sorbo: Prairie Fever and Avenging Angel.
I enjoyed the 3 movies on the dvd set. They are good stories and I will enjoy watching them over again.

product was scratched box dvd cover was broken on the inside finger prints all over the dvd...it was a gift and I was embarresed when the receiver told me about it. one movie also skips a bit.. will probably not buy used dvds again...was very disappointed that seller obviously did not check his product before listing it.
These movies were relatively clean and had good story lines. My husband really enjoyed them . We plan on passing them on to family members to enjoy.
You get three great westerns for a low price.  I enjoy all three movies however they were no frills but enough to provide for some afternoon entertainment.
Low budget!! Simple plots. For me this was a waste of time and money. I am still trying to figure out how I came to the decision to purchase this set of dvds.
Roles were written for him. Easy on the ears and eyes. Kids enjoyed watching over and over. Review is finished.

CLUNKERS BY THE THREE PACK...I got this cheap and didn't do poorly on it since it had 3 DISCS inside.  Story lines and acting are way below par....when will I quit trying to find a good western among these duds?
Three of my most favorite movies so glad they came in A THREE PACK awesome!!!!!  Kevin Sorbo and Luke Perry are my most favorite cowboy actors.
Very Good

Very good value for the price-3 DVDs. Each disk had a good story and fine production values. About time stories with a moral. Some violence but heck it is a western. Very enjoyable tales.
I am looking forward to watching these videos.
Most are worth watching again.

Saw these movies on the Hallmark Channel and have been wanting them for some time and finally got them. They are all great movies and highly recommend them.  Also received in short time and in great condition.
Loved all three movies in this set.

A funny story, I like Kevin Sorbo I think he is a great actor and I like some of his movies.  Since I already love westerns I was rather pleased to see this three western movies with Kevin Sorbo as the lead actor. When I got the package in the mail I couldn't wait to get to work (security guard) so I could watch the movies.  Then as I began to watch the first movie I was like oh s&%*t I have already seent this movie but really could not remember much about it so I watched it again. It was the same with the other two they seemed familiar but I wasn't sure. However it was a real joy to watch these movies again. Really good movies with an awesome actor,
B rated flicks, but entertaining non the less.
